Export.Routine: MIF414ESP01(mi) ; ML 21/9/99 ; ASTM protocol - ABBOTT Cell Dyne 4000 (Bi-Directional) s mi=$g(mi) i '$l(mi) q k ^TMIF(mi,10) s $zt="err^MIF000" i $$select^LVBMIMP(mi) q f j=1:1:PLIST s @("par"_j)=PLIST(j) s stx=$c(2),etx=$c(3),ack=$c(6),enq=$c(5),eot=$c(4) s lf=$c(10),cr=$c(13),(result,epis,FullRecord)="" i $$start^MIF000() q f d Main i $$stop^MIF000() q c par4 q Main r *R:10 e d q .d:" L "[(" "_par9_" ") loadlist^MIF000(mi) i $c(R)=enq d .d trace^MIF000(mi,"ENQ","H<--M"),ACK .f r *R:10 q:$c(R)=eot d ..i $c(R)=enq d trace^MIF000(mi,"ENQ","H<--M"),ACK q ..i $c(R)'=stx q ..s record=$$read^MIF000("",lf) q:'$l(record) ..s record=$p(record,$c(23),1) ..d trace^MIF000(mi,$tr(record,$c(13),"@"),"H<--M"),ACK ..s FullRecord=FullRecord_$e(record,2,$l(record)) i $c(R)=eot d .d trace^MIF000(mi,"EOT","H<--M") .f jj=1:1:$l(FullRecord,$c(13)) s record=$p(FullRecord,$c(13),jj) i $l(record) d .. ; query record ..i $e(record)="Q" d q ...s epis=$p($p(record,"|",3),"^",2) i $l(epis),$d(^TEPI(epis,1)) s ^TMP($zn,$j,"ENQ",epis)="" .. ; patient record ..i $e(record)="P" d q ...d LAST ...s (sample,epis,surname,result,date,time,QC)="" ...s surname=$p($p(record,"|",6),"^") .. ; order record ..i $e(record)="O" d q ...s epis=$tr($p($p(record,"|",3),"^",1)," "),QC=$s($p($p(record,"|",16),"^",1)="QC":"\"_$e(epis,$l(epis)),1:"") s:'$l(epis) epis=$tr($p($p(record,"|",4),"^",1)," ") .. ; result record ..i $e(record)="R" d q ...i $tr($p(record,"|",4)," ")="----" q ...s x1=$tr($p($p(record,"|",3),"^",8)," "),x2=$tr($p(record,"|",4)," "),x3=$tr($p(record,"|",7)," ") ...i $l(x1),$l(x2) s result=result_x1_$c(par10)_x2_$c(par10)_x3_$c(par11) ... ; date and time ...i $l($tr($p(record,"|",12)," ")) d ....s date=$$intdate^SSUTIL4($e($p(record,"|",12),1,4)_"/"_$e($p(record,"|",12),5,6)_"/"_$e($p(record,"|",12),7,8)) ....s time=($e($p(record,"|",12),9,10)*3600)+($e($p(record,"|",12),11,12)*60) .. ; last record ..i $e(record)="L" d LAST q .s FullRecord="" .d ORDER q LAST ; file result if exists i epis?1.99AN,$l(result) d file^MIF000(mi,sample,epis,surname,result,date,time,QC) s (sample,epis,surname,result,date,time,QC)="" q ORDER ; create list of orders if exists s epis="" f s epis=$o(^TMP($zn,$j,"ENQ",epis)) q:epis="" d .d scanone^MIF000(mi,epis) .d PATDET(epis) .s tc="",tcx="," f N=1:1 s tc=$o(^TMP("MIF-SINGLE",$j,mi,epis,tc)) q:tc="" s tcx=tcx_tc_"," .d SET(epis,tcx) .s line=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,""),-1)+1,^TMIF(mi,10,line)="L|1|N" .k ^TMP($zn,$j,"ENQ",epis) .d Send K ^TMIF(mi,10) q SAVE ; create loadlist records s epis=^TMIF("MIF000",$j,"LL","EPISODE"),epis=$p(epis,$c(1),1) s sample=^TMIF("MIF000",$j,"LL","SAMPLE") d PATDET(epis) s tc="" f s tc=$o(^TMIF("MIF000",$j,"LL","TEST",tc)) q:tc="" d SET(epis,tc) q PATDET(epis) ; set patient details record i '$$select^LVBEPVIS(epis,"Y") d q .f j=1:1:PLIST i $d(PLIST) s PLIST(j)=$p(PLIST(j),$c(1)) .s sex=$s($g(PLIST(5))="M":"M",$g(PLIST(5))="F":"F",1:"U") .s (nace,anno,gfho,gfhd)="" . i $p(^TEPI(epis),"\",4)'="" s nace=$zd($p(^TEPI(epis),"\",4),8) ;,anno=$$edat(anno,$h) . ;i $p(^TEPI(epis),"\",25)'="" s anno="^"_$p(^TEPI(epis),"\",25) . i $p(^TEPI(epis),"\",25)'="" s anno=$p(^TEPI(epis),"\",25)_"^y" . i $p(^TEPI(epis),"\",49)'="" s gfho=$p(^TEPI(epis),"\",49) . i $p(^TEPI(epis),"\",20)'="" s gfhd=$p(^TEPI(epis),"\",20) . s nombre=$e($g(PLIST(3)),1,16)_"^"_$e($g(PLIST(4)),1,12),nombre=$tr(nombre,"Ã‘","N") .s line=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,""),-1)+1,^TMIF(mi,10,line)="P|1||||"_nombre_"||"_nace_"|"_sex_"||||||"_anno_"|"_gfho_"^"_gfhd_"^^"_$g(PLIST(20)) s line=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,""),-1)+1,^TMIF(mi,10,line)="P|1||||^||||||||" q SET(epis,tcx) ; set record to be sent to instrument s test="CBC" i tcx[",xxx," s test="CBCEC" i tcx[",yyy," s test="CBCEL" i tcx[",RETC," s test="CBC+RETC" i tcx[",RETC,",tcx[",yyy," s test="CBCEL+RETC" s (rango,anno2)="" i $p(^TEPI(epis),"\",4)'="" s dob=$$extdate2^SSUTIL4($p(^TEPI(epis),"\",4)),fecha=$$extdate2^SSUTIL4($p($h,",")) s yeardob=$p(dob,"/",3),yearfecha=$p(fecha,"/",3) s anno2=yearfecha-yeardob s monthdob=$p(dob,"/"),monthfecha=$p(fecha,"/") i monthdob=monthfecha d .s daydob=$p(dob,"/",2),dayfecha=$p(fecha,"/",2) .i daydob>dayfecha s anno2=anno2-1 i monthdob>monthfecha s anno2=anno2-1 i anno2'<1,anno2'>2 s rango="^^3" i anno2>2,anno2'>4 s rango="^^4" i anno2>4,anno2'>8 s rango="^^5" i anno2>8,anno2'>12 s rango="^^6" i anno2>12 d .s sexo=$s($g(PLIST(5))="M":"M",$g(PLIST(5))="F":"F",1:"U") .i sexo="M" s rango="^^7" .i sexo="F" s rango="^^8" s line=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,""),-1)+1,^TMIF(mi,10,line)="O|1|"_epis_"||^^^"_test_rango_"|||||||||||Patient^Human" q Send ; send list of orders if exists w enq,*-3 f j=1:1:10 r *R:1 i $c(R)=ack!($c(R)=enq) q i $c(R)=enq q i $c(R)'=ack w eot,*-3 q q:$$SEND("1H|\^&||||||||||P|1") s x="" f FRAME=2:1 s x=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,x)) q:x="" q:$$SEND(FRAME#8_^TMIF(mi,10,x)) w eot,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,"EOT","H-->M") q SEND(str) ; send string to instrument s str=str_cr_etx,chsum=$$CHSUM(str) w stx,str,chsum,cr,lf,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,str_chsum,"H-->M") f j=1:1:6 r *R:1 i ($c(R)=ack)!($c(R)=eot) q i $c(R)=ack d trace^MIF000(mi,"ACK","H<--M") q 0 i $c(R)=eot d trace^MIF000(mi,"EOT","H<--M") q 0 d trace^MIF000(mi,R,"H<--M") q 1 CHSUM(x) ; calculate check sum n (x) s z=0 f y=1:1:$l(x) s z=z+$a(x,y) s z=$e("0123456789ABCDEF",z#256\16+1)_$e("0123456789ABCDEF",z#16+1) q z ACK ; send 'ack' to instrument w ack,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,"ACK","H-->M") q
